questions.subject: CLIP_interrogator node
questions.question: What are the options available for the CLIP_interrogator node?
questions.answer: The CLIP_interrogator node has options to keep the CLIP/BLIP models alive, prepend BLIP caption, and save the prompt to a text file.

questions.subject: VAEDecode_to_folder node
questions.question: What is the purpose of the VAEDecode_to_folder node?
questions.answer: The VAEDecode_to_folder node decodes VAE latents to images and saves them directly to a folder.

questions.subject: SaveImage node
questions.question: What features does the SaveImage node offer?
questions.answer: The SaveImage node allows for basic image saving, with an option to add timestamps and save the pipeline configuration as a JSON file.

questions.subject: eden_comfy_pipelines
questions.question: What is the purpose of the eden_comfy_pipelines collection?
questions.answer: eden_comfy_pipelines is a collection of custom nodes and workflows for ComfyUI, designed to enhance its functionality.

questions.subject: eden_comfy_pipelines
questions.question: What type of nodes are included in the eden_comfy_pipelines collection?
questions.answer: The collection includes nodes for CLIP image generation, VAE latent decoding, and image saving.

questions.subject: eden_comfy_pipelines
questions.question: Is all of the functionality in eden_comfy_pipelines complete?
questions.answer: Note that some of the nodes in the collection are still under development and not fully functional.
